Variance
========
```{r}
y <- c(13,7,5,12,9,15,6,11,9,7,12)
var(y)

variance <- function(x) sum((x-mean(x))^2)/(length(x)-1)
variance(y)

v <- function(x) sum(x/length(x))
v(y)

s <- function(x) sum (x)
s(y)

s(y)/length(y)

a <- c(0,50,100,100,50,0)
b <- c(50,50,50,50,50,50)
c <- c(60,60,60,60,60,0)

mean(a)
var(a)
sd(a)

mean(b)
var(b)
sd(b)

mean(c)
var(c)
sd(c)
```
